about_the_game: Show other players who the real seasoned Hunter is: the Veteran skin pack allows Van Helsing to become more intimidating (or more silly, if you ask Katarina) in his appearance.
detailed_description: Show other players who the real seasoned Hunter is: the Veteran skin pack allows Van Helsing to become more intimidating (or more silly, if you ask Katarina) in his appearance.

fullgame.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 (Snow Leopard) or later
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 330M, Intel HD4000 or AMD HD4670
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 (Snow Leopard) or later
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 285M or Nvidia 640M or AMD HD4870
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Van Helsing: Veteran Multiplayer Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800, Radeon HD4000, Intel HD4000 (min. 512 MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit), Windows 8 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or Radeon HD5800
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card

short_description: Show other players who the real seasoned Hunter is: the Veteran skin pack allows Van Helsing to become more intimidating (or more silly, if you ask Katarina) in his appearance.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
